title: Rhaast icon
body: So I've seen people who already have their Rhaast icon, and I know I've defenitely played at least 5 games with and against Rhaast, so is there a time frame for when it gets added to your account? That's a really cool summoner icon and I would prefer not to lose it

replies.body: I looked into this for you but was unable to find missions for that.  You'll need to unlock Kayn first in order to unlock those missions.  Let me know if that clears things up!
